subject: Restoration and Renovation
United States Open (Golf)
Golf
PGA Championship
United States Women's Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The Pinehurst No. 2 course, recently returned to its original appearance with irregular sand and native vegetation, will host the United States Open and the United States Women’s Open in the coming weeks.
snippet: The Pinehurst No. 2 course, recently returned to its original appearance with irregular sand and native vegetation, will host the United States Open and the United States Women’s Open in the coming weeks.
